=== My little story with ubuntu ===
It was a cold, dark and rainy night of November '10... My computer was needed formating but i didn't want to install windows again...
So i decided to say "no" in windows! 
In the same night i was searching on internet about Linux distros in Greek language. Reading articles and comments i realized that ubuntu was an easy OS and with a very active community and probably was fitted to my needs. 
The next day i made a registration on ubuntu-gr forum, in order to find information (as noob) for installation ubuntu on my system. After a few days later and while i had read a tutorial on ubuntu-gr forum, a took a back up of my personal files and i download the ubuntu on my disk... i burnt a cd and goodbye windows... Since then i run ubuntu and only!
